dcterms:creator: OpenAI Gym Team
dcterms:description: A continuous control benchmark where an underpowered car must reach the top of a hill by gaining momentum from another hill. The environment provides a deceptive reward signal, making it challenging for reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Continuous Mountain Car (CMC)

dcterms:creator: OpenAI Gym Team
dcterms:description: A benchmark where a bipedal robot must learn to run efficiently. The environment provides a reward based on linear velocity and penalizes for energy expenditure, making it a challenging problem for reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Half-Cheetah (HC)
